content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (x=-9.5, y=1.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=1.5) - currently working
- Boiler (x=-5.5, y=4.0) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (x=-0.5, y=7.5) - not connected to power network, no input liquid
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Small electric pole (x=1.5, y=7.5)

The system is currently not operational as the boiler has run out of fuel. Coal was added in step 82 and 84, but by step 87 it was depleted again.

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup (x=18.5, y=73.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (x=18.5, y=73.5) mining iron ore - currently not working due to power outage and full chest
- Wooden chest (x=18.5, y=75.5) collecting iron ore from the drill (currently contains 800 iron ore)
- Stone furnace (x=19.0, y=77.0) with 17 coal, currently working with 4 iron ore
- Inserter (x=19.5, y=78.5) to move iron plates from furnace to chest - not working due to power outage
- Wooden chest (x=19.5, y=79.5) for iron plate storage (currently contains 13 iron plates)
- Chest output inserter (x=19.5, y=80.5) to extract plates from chest - not working due to power outage
- Transport belt system starting at (x=19.5, y=81.5) with belts extending to (x=14.5, y=78.5) - currently contains 32 iron plates
- Additional belt system from (x=8.5, y=75.5) to (x=9.5, y=77.5) connecting to the circuit assembly
- Small electric poles (x=21.5, y=73.5), (x=20.5, y=75.5), (x=21.5, y=78.5), (x=21.5, y=80.5)

The system is partially working with the stone furnace still smelting iron ore into plates, but the electric components are not operational due to power outage.

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup (x=-48.5, y=78.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (x=-48.5, y=78.5) mining copper ore - currently not working due to power outage and full chest
- Wooden chest (x=-48.5, y=80.5) collecting copper ore from the drill (currently contains 800 copper ore)
- Stone furnace (x=-48.0, y=82.0) with 16 coal, currently working with 5 copper ore
- Inserter (x=-47.5, y=83.5) to move copper plates from furnace to chest - not working due to power outage
- Wooden chest (x=-47.5, y=84.5) for copper plate storage (currently contains 12 copper plates)
- Chest output inserter (x=-47.5, y=85.5) to extract plates from chest - not working due to power outage
- Transport belt system starting at (x=-47.5, y=86.5) extending to (x=-22.5, y=86.5) - currently contains 103 copper plates
- Small electric poles (x=-45.5, y=78.5), (x=-46.5, y=80.5), (x=-45.5, y=83.5), (x=-45.5, y=85.5)

The system is partially working with the stone furnace still smelting copper ore into plates, but the electric components are not operational due to power outage.

### Circuit Production System
Consists of:

#### Copper Cable Assembly (x=-6.5, y=74.5)
- Assembling machine 2 (x=-6.5, y=74.5) set to produce copper cables - currently not working due to power outage
- Input inserter (x=-8.5, y=74.5) to feed copper plates - not working due to power
